Amilcar is 52 years old.  He was only able to study until the end of 1st grade because he had to work to help his family.  He is married and has 7 children.  Four of them are young and in school while the others work with Amilcar in farming.  His wife, in addition to running the house, sells pupusas every day.  He has been a farmer since he was young and learned from his father.  Currently, he has 14,000 square meters of corn planted.  He wakes up every day at 5:00 am to milk the cows, get the milk ready to sell, and go work on his crops that are located one kilometer from where he lives.  At the end of the day, he helps his wife sell pupusas.

Amilcar needs to buy fertilizer for his corn crop.  In addition, he needs to prepare 7,000 square meters for the planting of another crop.  Amilcar's goal is to restore his cattle herd and support his children through college.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and prepare a plot for planting.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en: Irene was able to grow her business from the previous loan. She repaid the loan without challenges and now she seeks another loan to add to her stock of cereals and fruits for the business. Her business improved after the loan and she was able to pay school fees for her children. The major challenges in the business is the high cost of fuel and transportation. She hopes that the business will generate enough income so that in five years she will own her own place of work and not pay rent anymore.

loans.use: to add to her stock of cereals and fruits

loans.name: Ranj's Group

texts.en:
Dyari is a member of this group from Iraq. Dyari is 33 years old, married and has two children. Dyari is a veterinarian; he has five years of experience in this job.

Dyari has a smart 8-year-old boy named Zhyar, who always gets high grades in school. He is studying in a private school. The annual tuition for the school is very expensive. Every year the family faces the problem of making ends meet at the beginning of the school year for the additional expense that is needed to cover the fees, school uniform and books. With this loan, now they can accommodate all these expenses and continue to give him the best education possible.

He is requesting a loan to pay for his son's tuition fees and other school expenses. Zhyar loves traveling and airplanes, and his dream is to become a pilot.

The story of Zhyar is just one of the many examples of Izdiharona Economic Development clients who are able to get a better education. They preferred to have their faces altered for cultural reasons.

loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Frida

texts.en:
Fridah operates a general store business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition from other food stall operators in her business. 

With 30,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase sugar, rice, wheat flour and maize flour for sale. She dreams of expanding to her business to earn more income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, wheat flour and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en: Sophia is seeking another loan to open another food business. Sophia is now 36 years old, and she is grateful that she had her first loan that she repaid without challenges. She is also happy that she was able to get a tender to cook for schoolchildren on Saturday, and this has really improved her income since she doesn't compete with anyone. Her business also generated extra income that she used to pay school fees and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to open another food business.

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Шахло всего 29 лет. Она с ранних лет помогала родителям с работой на скотном дворе, и знает это ремесло очень хорошо. Купле-продажей крупнорогатого скота Шахло начала заниматься три года тому назад и по сей день продолжает выращивать скот для дальнейшей продажи. Она из района Зафаробод. Большая часть людей в районе занимаются животноводством, выращиванием скота и производством молока. В данный момент Шахло имеет только одну дойную корову и бычка. И хочет на деньги от кредита купить пару бычков и увеличить поголовье скота. Шахло уверена, что у нее все получится, потому что ей всегда помогут ее сын и муж. Желаем ей успеха в делах.
texts.en: Shahlo is only 29 years old. Since the yearly years she has been helping her parents work with livestock and knows this craft very well. She started buying and reselling cattle three years ago and continues to grow cattle for future resale. She is from the Zafarobod region. A large part of the residents in the region do animal husbandry and grow cattle and produce milk. At this time Shahlo only has one milk cow and a calf. She wants to use the loan money to buy a couple of calves and increase the headcount of livestock. Shahlo is positive that everything will come out alright because her son and husband always help her. We wish her success in her business.

loans.use: to purchase calves and increase the headcount of livestock.

loans.name: Salohiddin

texts.ru:
Многие граждане Таджикистана на заработках заграницей, потому что в городах очень мало рабочих мест, а в районах и деревнях основным видом деятельности является животноводство или растениеводство. И молодим людям, чтобы прокормить семью приходиться покидать родные города, селы и районы для финансового обеспечения родных людей. И всем им нелегко вдали от Родины и родных душ. Салохиддин настолько любить свою семью, что не смог далеко уехать, хоть и на Родине работа тяжелая и мало платят, это не страшно, ведь он будет рядом семьей. 
Салохиддину 30 лет он работает фермеров. Работа на земле тяжелая, но он не жалуется. Салохиддину помогает жена. Он мог бы все сам сделать, но ее присутствие дает ему силу. У Салохиддина большая семья с ним живут жена, шестеро детей, родители и трое братьев. К приходу зимы он хорошо готовиться и кредит берет с целью приобрести минеральные удобрения и горючей смеси для техники. Салохиддин счастлив, что у него такая дружная семья, и она именно она поможет осеннему посеву.
texts.en:
Many of Tajikistan's inhabitants are migrant workers, because there are very few jobs in the cities, and in the regions and villages the main type of business is livestock breeding and crop cultivation. Young people have to leave their native cities, villages and regions to, in order to feed their family and support the native people financially. And to them all, it is not easy to be far away from their native land and soul. 

Salohiddin loves his family so much that he was not able to travel far, even though work is hard and they pay is small in his native country. It is not strange, as he can be near his family. Salohiddin is 30 years old and works as a farmer. The work in the field is hard, but he does not complain. Salohiddin's wife helps him. He could do it by himself, but her presence gives him strength. 

Salohiddin has a large family. He lives with his wife, six children, parents and three brothers. He prepares well for the arrival of winter and takes a loan with an aim to purchase mineral fertilizers and fuel mix for his appliances. Salohiddin is happy that he has such a friendly family, and that they always help with the fall sowing.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and fuel mixture to prepare for the fall sowing

loans.name: Ricardo Rivera Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres comerciantes emprendedoras una de ellas es Milagros mujer de 37 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogos de Arabela, Avon y Celza desde hace 3 años, es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año. El crédito lo solicita para comprar cosméticos al contado como es cremas, lociones, lápiz delineador, tratamientos faciales, etc. Celsa mujer de 38 años de edad se dedica al negocio de la venta de ropa interior y María Isabel mujer de 37 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos variados.
texts.en: The group consists of three entrepreneurial retailers. One of them is Milagros, a 37-year-old woman, who has two children under her care. Her 3-year-old business includes the sale of cosmetics through the following catalogs: Arebela, Avon, and Celza. She has been a client of the institution for a year. She has requested this loan to buy cosmetics with cash, such as creams, lotions, eye liner pencils, face treatments, etc. Celsa, a 38-year-old woman, works selling underwear, and María Isabel is a 37-year-old woman whose business involves the sale of various kinds of cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics such as creams, lotions, eye liner pencils, face treatments, etc.

loans.name: Las Puntuales Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro socias una de ellas es Consuelo mujer de 51 años de edad, vive en unión libre, su negocio es la venta de oro y plata desde hace 20 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de más inventario de prendas de oro y plata como anillos, cadenas, aretes y pulseras. Rubi mujer de 30 años su negocio es  la venta de ropa nueva, usada y cosméticos, Rosa mujer de 43 años de edad su negocio es el destace de cerdo, venta de gaseosas y golosinas y Nilda mujer 49 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa, calzado, hielo, y refrescos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 4 members, one of whom is Consuelo, a 51-year-old woman who lives in a common-law marriage. Selling gold and silver has been her business for 20 years. She is asking for a loan to buy more inventory of gold and silver jewelry such as rings, chains, earrings, and bracelets. 

The other women in this group are: Rubi, a 30-year-old woman who sells new and used clothing and cosmetics, Rosa, a 43-year-old woman whose business is a butcher shop that also sells soda water and candies, and Nilda, a 49-year-old woman who sells clothing, shoes, ice, and soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy more inventory of gold and silver jewelry such as rings, chains, earrings, and bracelets.

loans.name: Primero Dios Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios microempresarios uno de ellos es Damaso un hombre muy trabajador de 57 años. Se dedica a la agricultura desde hace  11 años, casado, con un hijo bajo su cargo. Tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de insumos para la siembra de maíz y comercializacion de frijoles crudos. Rolando tiene 50 años él se dedica al negocio de  elaboración de zapatos y María tiene  53 años y su negocio es la venta de sandalias.
texts.en: This group has three members who are small business owners. One of these is Damaso, a 57-year-old hard-working man. He has worked in agriculture for 11 years. He is also married and looks after his son. He has been a client of this institution for five years and is requesting a loan in order to purchase supplies for planting corn and selling his beans to market. Rolando is 50 years old and makes shoes for a living. Maria is 53 years old and sells sandals for a living.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for planting corn and selling beans

loans.name: Laura Vicuña Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro microempresarias  de éxito una de ellas es Apolonea una mujer de 45 años de edad, viuda, su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 20 años. Sus productos los comercializa en el mercado, tiene 7 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de más inventario de frutas y verduras como naranja, papa, ajo, tomate, etc. Jenny  mujer de 34 años ella se dedica al negocio de la venta de frutas y verduras, Jazmina mujer de 26 años su negocio es una mueblería y Josefa ella tiene 58 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en: The group is made up of four successful micro-entrepeneurs.  One of them, Apolonea, is a 45-year-old widow.  Her business for the last 20 years has been the sale of fruit and vegetables.  She sells her produce in the market and she has been a client in the institution for 7 years.  She is asking for the loan to buy more stock of fruit and vegetables, such as oranges, potatoes, garlic, tomatoes, etc.  The other members of the group are Jenny, 34, who works selling fruit and vegetables; Jazmina, 26, whose business is a furniture store; and Josefa, 58, whose business is the sale of fruit and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruit and vegetables such as oranges, potatoes, garlic, and tomato.

loans.name: Adonai Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman cuatro miembros emprendedores y luchadores uno de ellos es Dorcas mujer de  44 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es una pulpería que tiene en su domicilio desde hace 2 años. El crédito lo requiere para surtir más su negocio. Comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, jabón, frijoles, gaseosa coca cola,  big cola y detergente. María mujer de 45 años de edad su negocio es la venta de productos lácteos, Kedwin hombre de 28 años se dedica a la fabricación de muebles y Juana mujer de 63 años y su negocio es la elaboración de muebles.
texts.en: This group is comprised of four hard-working entrepreneurs. One of them, Dorcas, is a 44-year old woman who is married and has two dependent children. She has had a grocery shop at her home for two years. She needs the loan to buy more merchandise to sell: rice, sugar, cooking oil, soap, broad beans, soft drinks and detergent. The other members of the group are María (45), who sells dairy, Kedwin (28), and Juana (63), both carpenters.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Las Frescas Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres mujeres esforzadas una de ellas es Esmeralda una mujer luchadora de 33 años de edad, casada, con cuatro hijos menores bajo su cargo de 15, 13, 7 y 3 años. Su negocio es la venta de comida en su comunidad desde hace 12 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución desde hace 2  años.  El crédito lo está solicitando para invertir en comprar materia prima por cantidad como es granos básicos arroz, frijoles, aceite, carne de res, carne de cerdo, carne de pollo, vegetales, verduras, etc. Concepción mujer de 35 años de edad se dedica al negocio de la venta de nacatamales  y  Dominga mujer de 54 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de nacatamales y comida.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking women.  Esmeralda is a hardworking 33 year old woman. She is married and has three young children, ages 15, 13, 7, and 3.  She has been selling food in her community for 12 years and has been working with the institution for two years.  She is asking for this loan to buy ingredients such as rice, beans, cooking oil, beef, pork, chicken, vegetables, etc.  Concepcion is 35 years old and sells nacatamales, and Dominga is 54 years old and sells nacatamales and other food.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Ilucion Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo integran seis mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es María mujer de 49 años de edad, soltera, con una hija de 18 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y usada desde hace 5 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución desde hace 7 años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de pacas de ropa mixta y ropa nueva como calcetas, brasieres, blúmeres, zapatos usados. María de los Ángeles mujer de 40 años de edad se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa nueva, usada, y calzado nuevo, Fátima mujer de 38 años de edad, su negocio es estilista y venta de ropa nueva, Karla mujer de 28 años su negocio es la venta de nacatamales, queso y café, Jessica mujer de 37  años se dedica al negocio de  vender ropa usada, cosméticos y calzado y Concepción mujer de 49 años y su negocio es elaborar bolsos y ropa de cama.
texts.en: This group is comprised of six women entrepreneurs. María is one of them: she is 49 years old, single, and has an 18-year old daughter. She has been selling clothing, both used and new, for the past five years. She has been a client of the field partner for seven. The loan will be used to buy mixed bags of clothes such as socks, brassieres, and bloomers, as well as used shoes. The other members of the group are: María de los Ángeles (40), who sells new and used clothing, and new shoes, Fátima (38), a stylist who also sells new clothes, Karla (28), who sells nacatamales, cheese, and coffee, Jessica (37), who sells used clothing, cosmetics, and shoes, and Concepción (49), who makes bags and linens.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell, both used and new.

loans.name: Las Elegidas Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres socios luchadores y emprendedores una de ellos es  Mercedes mujer de 60 años de edad, viuda, con una hija mayor bajo su cargo. Su negocio es la venta de ropa usada desde hace 15 años. Este negocio lo tiene ubicado en su domicilio, su hija y ella atiende a los clientes, tiene de ser cliente de la institución desde hace 6 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de ropa usada y compra de zapatos nuevos. Anespajita  mujer de 65 años de edad se dedica al negocio de venta de refresco, golosina, gaseosa, raspadita, lotería y Larry hombre de 34 años de edad,  su negocio es la venta de CD.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking, enterprising partners.  Mercedes is one of them and she is 60 years old and a widow with a daughter.  She has been selling used clothing for 15 years and her business is located in her home.  She and her daughter serve customers and she has been working with the institution for six years.  She will use the money from this loan to buy used clothing and new shoes.  Anespajita, age 65 sells soft drinks, snacks, snow cones, and lottery tickets; and Larry, age 35, sells CDs.

loans.use: to buy used clothing.

loans.name: Buen Pastor Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres mujeres luchadoras y  emprendedoras una de ellas es  Isabel mujer de 50 años de edad casada, con una hija de 31 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa usada, venta de comida, frutas y frescos desde hace 20 años su hija y ella son las que se encargan del negocio, tiene 9 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo requiere para compra de paca de ropa usada y materia prima para la elaboración de la comida como es arroz, leña, frijoles, aceite, carbón, queso, carne de res, carne de cerdo, carne  de pollo, plátanos, bolsas, papel de comida. Melida mujer de 45 años de su negocio es una pulpería en su domicilio y Damaris mujer de 34 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de recarga, chiverías, gaseosa, hielo y agua.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking and enterprising women.  Isabel is one of them; she is 50 years old, married, and has a 31 year old daughter.  She has been selling used clothing, food, fruits, and drinks for 20 years.  He daughter and she run the business and she has been working with the institution for nine years.  She needs this loan to buy a pack of used clothing, and supplies to make her food, such as rice, firewood, beans, cooking oil, charcoal, cheese, beef, pork, plantains, bags, and butcher paper.  Melinda, 45 years old runs a store out of her home; and Damaris, 34 years old, sells recarga, chiverías, soft drinks, ice, and water

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: La Domesticas Group

texts.es: El Grupo lo conforman tres mujeres esforzadas microempresarias una de ellas es Julia mujer de 45 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos de 25 y 18 años. Su negocio es fabricar cepillos de lavar ropa desde hace 17 años de edad,  sus hijos le ayudan en la elaboración del producto, es cliente de la institución desde hace  3 años. El crédito lo requiere para comprar materia prima como es nylon, madera, alambre, mazo, tijeras, etc. Dolores mujer de 42 años de edad se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catálogo de Avon y Margarita mujer de 30 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking small businesswomen.  Julia is one of them.  She is 45 years old, single, and has two children, ages 25 and 18.  She has been making clothing scrub brushes since she was 17 years old.  Her children help her make her products and she has been working with the institution for three years.  She needs this loan to buy supplies such as nylon, wood, wire, mallets, scissors, etc.  Dolores, age 42, sells Avon cosmetics via catalog; and Margarita, age 30, sells new clothing.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Jacqueline Vanessa

texts.es: Jacqueline es una mujer muy emprendedora de 31 años de edad, madre soltera, con un hijo de 12 años, su negocio es la de  una pulpería desde hace 3 años ubicada en su domicilio. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 6 años el crédito le ha ayudado mucho ya que empezó vendiendo cosmético y ahora quiere invertir en comprar inventario para su pulpería como arroz, aceite, azúcar, frijoles, jabón, café, shampoo, gaseosa, detergente, pasta de diente, papel higiénico, caramelos, galletas, meneítos, etc.
texts.en: Jacqueline is a very enterprising 31-year-old woman. A single mother with a son of 12 years old, she has run a grocery store from her home for the past 3 years. She has been a client of this institution for six years, and the loan has helped her a lot since she began selling cosmetics. Now she wants to invest in buying stock for her store such as rice, oil, sugar, beans, soap, coffee, shampoo, soft drinks, detergent, toothpaste, toilet roll, sweets, biscuits, snacks, etc.

loans.use: to buy stock for her store such as rice, oil, sugar, beans, soap, coffee, shampoo, soft drinks, detergent, toothpaste, toilet roll, sweets, biscuits, snacks, etc.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel es una mujer microempresaria de éxito de 48 años de edad casada, con un hijo de 16 años bajo su cargo, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 8 años, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en comprar en inventario como aceite, frijoles, jabones, pasta dental, azúcar, arroz, gaseosa, helados, hielo, queso, leche, shampoo, desodorante, etc.
texts.en:
Isabel is a successful woman who owns a small business. She is forty-eight years old, married and has a sixteen-year-old child under her care. Her business is a small grocery store that has been located in her home for eight years. 

She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of inventory like oil, brands, soaps, toothpaste, sugar, rice, soft drinks, ice cream, ice, cheese, milk, shampoo, deodorant, etc.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of staple goods like corn, beans, sugar, oil, detergent, bath soap, dish soap, toothpaste, a variety of soft drinks, ice cream, ice, cheese, milk, shampoo, deodorant, etc.

loans.name: Asociacion Sin Fronteras Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Lidia una mujer luchadora de 42 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la venta de artesanía de madera y una mini pulpería desde hace 4 años, su marido le ayuda a despachar la mini pulpería mientras ella atiende el negocio de la artesanía que tiene ubicado en Catarina. Tiene 6 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de artesanía de madera y granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles, etc. para su pulpería, Socorro mujer de 55 años su negocio es la venta de papeles para la fritangas y Felipa mujer de 54 años su negocio es la venta de verduras.
texts.en: This group is made up of three small businesswomen.  Lidia is one of them and she is a hardworking, 42 year old woman.  She is married and sells wooden arts and crafts.  She has also had a small store for four years.  Her husband helps her run her store, while she tends to the art business that she has in Catarina.  She has been working with the institution for six years and is asking for this loan to buy wooden arts and crafts and rice, sugar, cooking oil, beans, etc. for her store.  Socorro, age 55, sells food wrappers for fry restaurants; and Felipa, age 54, sells vegetables.

loans.use: to buy wooden arts.

loans.name: Nueva Vida Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras de éxito una de ellas es Lilliam mujer de 33 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 16 y 13 años, su negocio es la venta de verduras desde hace 5 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución desde hace 15 años. El crédito lo solicita para  comprar sacos de verduras como papas, cebolla, chiltoma y ajo. Teresa mujer de 64 años de edad se dedica al negocio de la venta de cosa de horno y Silvia mujer de 44 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tamal pisque, pinol y pinolillo.
texts.en: This group is made up of three successful, enterprising women.  Lilliam, age 33, is married and has two children, ages 16 and 13.  She has been selling vegetables for five years and has been working with the institution for 15 years.  She is asking for this loan to buy sacks of vegetables such as potatoes, onions, chiltoma, and garlic.  Teresa, age 64, sells baked goods; and Silvia, age 44, sells tamales, roasted corn, and pinolillo.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Aleyda Group

texts.es: Este grupo está conformado por tres socias emprendedoras y luchadoras una de ellas es Griselda mujer de 24 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es un taller de costura desde hace 2 años, su mama y su hermana trabajan junto con ella cociendo. Tiene 1 año de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de telas, hilos, botones, cintas, crochet, Sugey mujer de 32 años de edad su negocio es la elaboración y venta de piñatas y Clara mujer de 30 años de edad y su negocio es la compra y venta de frutas.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking and enterprising partners.  Griselda is one of them.  She is 24 years old, single, and has had a sewing shop for two years.  Her mother and sister work with her.  She has been working with the institution for one year and will use the money from this loan to buy fabrics, threads, buttons, laces, and crochets.  Sugey, age 32, makes and sells piñatas; and Clara, age 30, buys and sells fruits.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Dulce Sinfonia Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Zayda una mujer de 29 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos de 4 y 2 años, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 4 años. Su mama le ayuda a despachar,  Es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año tiempo que ha demostrado ser muy responsable. El crédito lo solicita para comprar granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabones de lavar ropa y comprar un congelador. Melania mujer de 41 año su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras y Fátima joven de 21 años y su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en: This group is made up of three enterprising partners.  Zayda is one of them.  She is 29 years old, single, and has two children, ages 4 and 2.  She has had a store in her home for the past four years and her mother helps her serve customers.  She is asking for a loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, laundry soap, and also a freezer.  Melania, age 41, sells fruits and vegetables, and Fatima, age 21, also sells fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Flor Del Oto Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios microempresarios uno de ellos Michael hombre trabajador de 28 años de edad, acompañado, con dos hijos de 6 y 2 años. Su negocio es vender productos variados desde hace 7 años, sus productos los comercializa ambulante en el mercado de Masaya. Tiene 2 años y medio de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para comprar más inventario de talladores, toallas, chinelas de hule, etc. Karla mujer de 22 años de edad su negocio es comercializar productos varios como toallas, talladores, chinelas y Flor mujer 21 años su negocio es la venta de productos variados como chinelas, prensadores, talladores, toallas.
texts.en: This group is made up of three small business owners.  Michael is one and is a hardworking, 28 year old man.  He is married and has two children, ages 6 and 2.  He has been selling various products for seven years on foot in the Masaya market.  He has been working with the institution for two and a half years and is asking for this loan to buy inventory such as rubber scrubbers, towels, rubber slippers, etc.  Karla, age 22, sells various products such as towels, scrubbers, and slippers; and Flor, age 21, sells various products such as slippers, hair pins, scrubbers, and towels.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Jehova Nice Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres socias luchadoras una de ellas es Esperanza mujer de 50 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es una pulpería que tiene ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 15 años, es cliente de la institución desde hace 6 años el crédito lo requiere para la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles crudos, aceite, azúcar, jabón, ace, cloro, gaseosas, productos lácteos. Rosa mujer de 72 años de edad su negocio es la venta de prendas de plata y Nora mujer de 45 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de pollo.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking partners.  Esperanza is one of them.  She is 50 years old, single, and has had a store in her home for 15 years.  She has been working with the institution for six years and needs this loan to buy rice, raw beans, cooking oil, sugar, soap, ace, bleach, soft drinks, and dairy products.  Rosa, age 72, sells silver accessories; and Nora, age 45, sells chicken.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por tres socias de negocio una de ellas es Elsa mujer de 28 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 10 y 5 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa  nueva desde hace 5 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución  2 años, el crédito lo requiere para comprar inventario de ropa nueva como pantalones, faldas, camisas, blusas, shores, y compra de materia prima para la elaboración de buñuelos, cabeza de chancho, frito y venta de frescos. Martha mujer de 29 años se dedica a la venta de platanitos, cosméticos de Avon y Arabela y María mujer de 34 años de edad su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon, Arabela, helados, gaseosas, comida y piñata
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members. One of them is Elsa, a 28 year old woman with a partner and two children of 10 and 5 years of age. She has worked selling new clothes for five years and has been a client of this institution for two. She needs a loan to buy merchandise such as pants, skirts, jumpers, shirts, and shorts, and to buy ingredients to make buñuelos, pigs head and fries as well as soft drinks to sell. 

Martha, a 29 year old woman, sells plantains and cosmetics from Avon and Arabela, while María, a 34 year old woman, also sells Avon and Arabela cosmetics as well as ice cream, soft drinks, food and piñatas.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pants, skirts, jumpers, shirts, and shorts, and to buy ingredients to make buñuelos, pigs head,and fries as well as soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Lluvia De Amor Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es Ninoska mujer de 28 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 9 años y 2 meses. Su negocio es comercializar productos variados desde hace 7 años,  ella y su marido  van a vender ambulantes. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 4 años, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en comprar sillas de madera, cerámica, caramelos de leche de burra, trocante, churros, caramelos rayados. Xiomara mujer de 45 años de edad  su negocio es la venta de plantas, especies y artesanía, Waleska mujer de 25 años se dedica a comercializar artesanía, plantas y muebles y Luisa mujer de 56 años su negocio es  la venta de artesanía y verduras.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four enterprising women, one of whom is Ninoska, a 28 year old woman who has a partner and two children who are 9 years old and two months respectively. She has worked selling various products for seven years and both her and her husband work as street vendors. She has been a client of this institution for four years. The loan she is applying for at the moment will be used to buy wooden chairs, ceramics, caramels, trocantes, churros and other sweets.

 Xiomara is a 45 year old woman who runs a business selling plants, herbs and hand crafts. Waleska is a 25 year old woman who sells hand crafts, plants and furniture, while Luisa is a 56 year old woman who works selling handcrafts and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy wooden chairs, ceramics, caramels, trocantes, churros and other sweets

loans.name: Los Zensontles Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Paula mujer de 42 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 22 y 17 años, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon, Selza y Estilo desde hace 8 años, sus productos los comercializa en su comunidad. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 7 años. El crédito lo requiere para comprar al contado cosméticos de Avon, Selza y Estilo como perfumes de varón y damas, boddy, lencería, sombras, máscaras para pestañas, lápiz de cejas, labiales, pinturas de uñas, etc. María mujer de 60 años de edad su negocio es la elaboración y venta de cosa de horno y María del Rosario mujer de 46 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members of micro businesses, one of whom is Paula, a 42 year old woman with a partner and two children of 22 and 17 years of age. She has sold Avon, Selza y Estilo cosmetics in her community for eight years and has been a client of this institution for seven. She needs this loan to buy Avon, Selza and Estilo cosmetics, perfumes for men and women, lingerie, eye shadow, mascara, eyebrow pencils, lipstick, nail polish etc. 

María is a 60 year old woman who runs a business making and selling oven baked goods, while María del Rosario is a 46 year old woman who sells cosmetics for a living.

loans.use: to buy Avon, Selza and Estilo cosmetics in cash, perfumes for men and women, lingerie, eye shadow, mascara, eyebrow pencils, lipstick, nail polish etc.

loans.name: Los Finqueros Group

texts.es: Este grupo está conformado tres socios luchadores uno de ellos es Johana mujer de 29 años de edad, acompañada con cuatro hijos de 15, 9 ,8 y 2 años. Su negocio es la venta de ropa usada y cosméticos por catálogo de Avon  desde hace 3 años. Su hermana le ayuda a distribuir en la zona franca. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 2 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar ropa interior como blumers, brasieres, bóxer y uniformes escolares. Ingrid mujer de 21 años de edad su negocio es la venta de cosméticos generales y Osmar hombre de 34 años de edad y su negocio es la agricultura.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three hard-working members. One is Johana, a 29-year-old woman who has four children aged 15, 9, 8, and 2.  She sells used clothing and has sold Avon cosmetics by catalog for the past three years. Her sister helps her with distribution in the free-trade zone. She has been a client of the institution for two years. The loan is being requested so she can buy underwear such as underpants, bras and boxers, and school uniforms.

Ingrid is a 21-year-old woman who sells cosmetics and Osmar is a 34-year-old man whose business is agriculture.

loans.use: to buy underwear such as underpants, bras, and boxers, and school uniforms.

loans.name: Los Tres Girasoles Group

texts.es: El grupo Está formado por tres socias microempresarias de éxito una de ellas es Jeaneth mujer de 36 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos de 6 años y 7 meses, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva, zapatos usados y repostería desde hace 10 años, estos productos los comercializa en Granada y Nindiri. Tiene 2 años y medio de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo solicita para comprar mercadería de ropa nueva como pantalones de varón y dama, blusas, camisas, shores, faldas, etc.  Y zapatos usados. Jessica mujer de 27 años de edad se dedica al negocio de vender ropa nueva y productos de Avon, María  joven de 23 años y su negocio es la venta de cerámica y muebles.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members of successful micro businesses, one of whom is Jeaneth, a 36 year old single woman with two children who are 6 years old and seven months. She has had a business selling new clothes, second hand shoes and confectionery for the last ten years and she sells these products in Granada and Nindiri. She has been a client of this institution for two and a half years and she needs this loan now to buy new clothes such as pants for men and women, shirts, tops, shorts, skirts, and second hand shoes. 

Jessica is a 27 year old woman who sells new clothes and Avon products, while María, a young woman of 23, sells ceramics and furniture.

loans.use: to buy new clothes such as pants for men and women, shirts, tops, shorts, skirts, and second hand shoes

loans.name: Carolina Asuncion

texts.es: Carolina es una joven de 20 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 9 años. Su mama le ayuda a despachar, El crédito lo solicita para compra de productos de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, crudos, aceite, azúcar, jabón de lavar ropa, jabón de lavar trastes, jabón de baño, gaseosas de diferentes tamaños, etc.
texts.en:
Carolina is a young single woman of 20 who has worked in a grocery store run from her home for the last nine years, with her mother helping her to serve customers. 

This loan will be used to purchase pulses such as rice and uncooked beans, oil, sugar, soap for washing clothes, dish washing and bathing, soft drinks of different sizes, etc.

loans.use: to buy pulses such as rice and uncooked beans, oil, sugar, soap for washing clothes, dish washing and bathing, soft drinks of different sizes, etc.
